params.text: You will learn why giving developmental feedback is essential for fostering growth, improving performance, and building effective relationships in the workplace.

panels.title: 1. Understand the Importance of Developmental Feedback:

params.text: You will effectively utilize the 'sandwich' technique of giving developmental feedback, ensuring clarity, balance, and cultural sensitivity within diverse professional environments.
You will develop your communication skills in English, including tone, language choice, and delivery, to ensure the feedback is well received and impactful.
You will gain awareness of cultural differences in feedback expectations and communication styles and learn how to adapt your feedback delivery approach accordingly.
